org.midica.ui.widget

Class MidicaTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTree
            • org.midica.ui.widget.MidicaTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class MidicaTree
extends javax.swing.JTree

    Class for Midica trees.

    These trees support tooltips in their nodes.

    They can also indicate if they are message trees. This will be evaluated from the Laf class, when nimbus is used.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

      • getToolTipText

        public java.lang.String getToolTipText(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)

        Returns a tooltip text according to the mouse pointer position.

        If the mouse pointer hovers a tree node, returns the node text.

        Otherwise: displays the general tree tooltip, if available.

        Overrides:
        getToolTipText in class javax.swing.JTree
        Parameters:
        e - the mouseover event
        Returns:
        the tooltip text for the node hovered by the mouse pointer
